name: Sonic Screwdriver
description: Sonic Screwdriver by TGA Subcool Genetics has been dubbed one of the best yielding plants of all time. With genetic parents Orange Cream Soda and Trainwreck, Sonic Screwdriver leans toward the sativa side, offering stimulating effects with bright, complex terpenes of ripening citrus and forest floor. Trainwreck gives this strain a strong, heady onset that hits right between the eyes, but afterwards settles into the body, exhibiting a comfortable energy throughout. This strain is ideal for overcoming lethargy, curbing minor physical pain, and stimulating the appetite.
descriptionPlain: Sonic Screwdriver by TGA Subcool Genetics has been dubbed one of the best yielding plants of all time. With genetic parents Orange Cream Soda and Trainwreck, Sonic Screwdriver leans toward the sativa side, offering stimulating effects with bright, complex terpenes of ripening citrus and forest floor. Trainwreck gives this strain a strong, heady onset that hits right between the eyes, but afterwards settles into the body, exhibiting a comfortable energy throughout. This strain is ideal for overcoming lethargy, curbing minor physical pain, and stimulating the appetite.

highlightedReviews.text:
I'm suprised there's not more reviews for this strain. Now I usually don't smoke sativas but I got this strain reviewed to me by the bud tender for Anxiety and depression as I'm going through one of the worse bouts of my life. 
(A little irritated at that bud tender though, as it caused a lot of positive introspective, it still left my mind buzzing and thinking to fast, and caused some anxiety, should've recommended me  a high CBD as if was a god send) 
75% sativa 
Not much to say about it tbh, your typical high leaning land race sativa. But super Stoney and euphoric, lots of positive introspective and a euphoric buzz and it won't leave you couch locked
7.2/10

I haven't been able to find this strain anywhere anymore but let me say this strain was amongst the best bud I have ever smoked in my life. 1 bowl and I can feel the high seeping into my body. Unreal effects, hits right in between the eyes, that good Stoney feeling. 10/10
